title: PC - International Rally Championship - Working on XP - RN1K3
description:
Internation Rally Championship
Working on XP
Simply copy the rally dir to C drive

Right click on RAL.EXE and go to compatibility tab and select the 1st (win95), 4th and 5th options as seen as: <a href="
http://bayimg.com/GAlDbAabP" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/GAlDbAabP</a>

Click apply
and run RAL.EXE
tweaks can be made to RAL.CFG in VAR dir

ENJOY

RN1K3
